name: Spot it: Find the Difference for toddlers: kids 3+
name_original: Spot it: Find the Difference for toddlers: kids 3+
description:
"Spot it" is a simple pattern recognition game.

It is a type of puzzle where kids must find 5 differences between two otherwise similar images!

• Award-winning game of visual perception for the whole family
• Develops focus, visual perception skills, and fine motor skills
• This photo hunt game is toddler tested
* Beautiful pictures
* Addictive game play that is fun for everyone!

Now let's play this new game!
